fact.description: The first-half is now underway.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Spain.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Spain throw-in in Netherlands's half.
Throw-in for Spain in their own half.
Ball safe as Spain is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Spain.
Netherlands awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
Netherlands's Wesley Sneijder gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Arena Fonte Nova.
Iniesta of Spain gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Netherlands at Arena Fonte Nova.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a throw-in for Spain, close to Netherlands's area.
Diego Costa (Spain) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Spain in their own half.
Spain awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spain awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Netherlands.
Spain's Diego Costa breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Spain a goal kick.
Spain drive upfield and David Silva gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Netherlands defender.
Spain have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Spain surge into the attack at Arena Fonte Nova but Gerard Pique’s header is off-target.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Netherlands a goal kick.
Netherlands needs to be cautious. Spain have an attacking throw-in.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spain's half?
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Spain in their own half.
Jonathan de Guzman (Netherlands) has received a first yellow card.
Spain have been given a penalty...
It's advantage Spain in Salvador as Xabi Alonso scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
Netherlands's Robin van Persie is whistled for offside at Arena Fonte Nova.
Spain to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Robin van Persie for Netherlands is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Netherlands close to the penalty box.
Spain awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Netherlands have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Netherlands capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spain's half?
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Spain in their own half.
Netherlands's Arjen Robben is on target but unsuccessful.
Robin van Persie of Netherlands is pulled up for offside.
Free kick Spain.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
In Salvador Netherlands's Arjen Robben is caught offside.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Spain.
Netherlands's Stefan de Vrij has been booked in Salvador.
Spain's Diego Costa has run offside.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
David Silva for Spain drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Spain.
Ball safe as Netherlands is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Great play from Daley Blind to set up the goal.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Spain throw-in in Netherlands's half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Spain awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spain to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Netherlands needs to be cautious. Spain have an attacking throw-in.
Can Spain get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Netherlands's half?
Throw-in Spain.
Iniesta gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spain.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spain's half?
Throw-in for Spain at Arena Fonte Nova.
Daley Blind with an assist there.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Daley Blind.
Daley Blind is back on the pitch.
Play is underway once more.
Netherlands awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spain to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Spain drive forward but Diego Costa is judged offside.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Netherlands throw-in in Spain's half.
In Salvador Netherlands attack through Robin van Persie. The finish is off target, however.
Spain awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli blows against Netherlands's Robin van Persie for offside.
Louis van Gaal is making the team's first substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Georginio Wijnaldum replacing Jonathan de Guzman.
Vicente del Bosque (Spain) is making a first substitution, with Fernando Torres replacing Diego Costa.
Pedro is on a sub for Xabi Alonso for Spain.
Free kick Netherlands.
Wesley Sneijder instrumental with a fine assist.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Spain in their own half.
Iker Casillas (Spain) has received a yellow card from Nicola Rizzoli.
Robin van Persie (Netherlands) gets a yellow card.
David Silva (Spain) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Spain.
Spain push forward through Pedro, whose finish on goal is saved.
Spain drive forward but David Silva is judged offside.
In Salvador Netherlands drive forward through Robin van Persie. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Spain goal kick.
Spain's Fernando Torres is whistled for offside at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Arena Fonte Nova.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spain's half?
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Great finish from Robin van Persie to give Netherlands a 1-4 lead.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Spain.
Sergio Ramos for Spain gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Netherlands at Arena Fonte Nova.
Netherlands make their second substitution with Joel Veltman replacing Stefan de Vrij.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Cesc Fabregas is replacing David Silva for Spain at Arena Fonte Nova.
Netherlands make their third substitution with Jeremain Lens replacing Robin van Persie.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Spain throw-in in Netherlands's half.
Netherlands take a comfortable 1-5 lead thanks to Arjen Robben.
Can Netherlands capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spain's half?
Ball safe as Spain is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Spain.
In Salvador, Fernando Torres (Spain) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Spain.
Nicola Rizzoli blows against Spain's Fernando Torres for offside.
Throw-in for Netherlands close to the penalty box.
Netherlands drive forward and Arjen Robben gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Salvador Netherlands drive forward through Arjen Robben. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Spain awarded a free kick in their own half.
Netherlands's Wesley Sneijder gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spain defender.
Free kick Netherlands.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a throw-in for Spain, close to Netherlands's area.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the second half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Spain territory.
Spain awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's 1-5 as the referee blows for full-time.
